夠.definition: enough (sufficient); enough (too much); (coll.) (before adj.) really; (coll.) to reach by stretching out

夠受的.definition: to be quite an ordeal; to be hard to bear

夠味.definition: lit. just the right flavor; just right; just the thing; excellent

夠得上.definition: to be good enough to be regarded as; to meet the standard expected of

夠得著.definition: to reach (with one's hand etc); (fig.) to attain (an objective)

夠意思.definition: wonderful; great; delightful; very kind; generous

夠戧.definition: variant of 夠嗆|够呛[gou4 qiang4]

夠本.definition: to break even; to get one's money's worth

夠格.definition: able to pass muster; qualified; apt; presentable
